it works fine, but can anybody tell me how to play this on lan please?

how to play via lan?

start l4d2  &  press  ~ for console then type "map c1" (all c1 maps will appear) do that up to c5. choose which map u will play then press enter. wait till the game loads then your neighbor pc connected in the same network as yours can detect what map u have created. it will be listed down their screen Steam Group Servers, just click that and join the game, thats it. no hamachi needed or garena. just plain l4d2.

* Changed rules for ghost placement in Scavenge Mode
* Player controlled Special Infected are no longer forced to un-crouch and lock strafe when they crouch attack
* Spitter spit that damages players on a moving elevator will now fizzle quickly

* Fixed pink glow on dead survivors
* Fixed being able to hold crouch while incapped to get better weapon accuracy
* Fixed players pushing against some props causing them to accumulate downward velocity and then take falling damage when they let go of the forward key
* Fixed a case where an incapped survivor inside a rescue vehicle would trigger both the escape sequence and a round restart
* Fixed the helping hand from getting stuck when extended

Left 4 Dead 2 FullRIP NoSteam [v2.0.0.3]

Installation Notes:
1) Extract
2) Open l4d2regkey.reg "

first get 7zip (just google that)
after you install that, select all the files you download, and right click them, select 7zip, and select "Extract to..." then extract them to a folder or anywhere, then explore that folder once it's done
there should be a l4d2regkey.reg file - simply double click that, and it'll add the registry to your computer

@jooonesjooones
go into the console `
type "map c..." where ... is the map you play (campaign 1/2/3/4/5, map 1/2/3/4/5)

after that you can type versus or survival or whatever mode you want, but it will be a campaign game if you don't have anything afterwards

then your buddies should see the game under "campaign (or whatever mode), steam group servers"

then click join and have fun :)

hi guys,
i need help : game crashes for me:(

i downloaded this torrent....then extracted it.

I then downloaded this mega patch "Left.4.Dead.2.MegaPatch.[2001-2007]-DarkSniper87 " and replaced all the files into the game directory.

Then i ran "l4d2regkey.reg" file and added it to windows registry.

i followed this mega patch steps to launch the game...i first ran "IniGen.exe"(entered a name and didnt close it)..then i ran "left4dead2.exe"...wen i started the "single player", game loaded to 100% then crashed without any error.....:(

i closed that "inigen.exe" ran the "Start Left 4 Dead 2.bat"...this time game loaded to 100% and then freezed on the loading screen.....had to restart my pc...

does anyone know how to fix this....please help..!

i installed MSvisual c++ 2005,2008 and i also have Dot Net 3.5 installed...

please help me out.....

EDIT: I figured it out :)

i just needed to press "ENTER" button after entering the name into "Inigen.exe"

IT WORKS NOW...THANKS for such wonderful working rip and patch...

BTW can i enter ANY name into "inigen" or i should enter only the ingame character's name ?
